formattedAddress: 237 W 105th St, New York, NY 10025, USA
adrFormatAddress: 237 W 105th St, New York, NY 10025, USA

originalText.text:
Lionheart has not only helped me get back into shape in a matter of months, it’s made the experience far more enjoyable than any other gym/workout class I’ve been to.

Jose, Ashley, Shawn, Montel have fostered such a welcoming environment, their classes accommodate everyone regardless of where they’re starting at.

Everything about Lionheart is excellent and well thought out, from small class sizes to clean workout space.

Boxing/Kickboxing/Butts & Guts were all fantastic classes, focused on form and skills as much as fitness.

I highly recommend getting a membership to make the most of the classes!

originalText.text: I have always struggled with feeling intimidated at big gyms and brand name workout classes but need the accountability and motivation of working out with other people. From the moment I walked through the door at Lionheart, I knew I had found my gym. Owners Ashley and Jose (and their pup Macie) are approachable and welcoming, and their small group classes are so accepting and have a strong sense of community. I have been doing personal training sessions with Ashley for 2 months now, and it’s been the best investment in my physical and mental health - not to mention the most consistent I have ever been with a fitness routine. I can’t say enough about what a special place Lionheart is and I highly recommend for both classes and personal training.

originalText.text:
This is absolutely a gym for everyone and anyone. As someone who suffers from severe anxiety and panic disorder(and is also plus-size), finding a gym that makes me feel comfortable is impossible.

I signed up for a shadow kickboxing class to see if this was the gym I would be interested in forever. And it absolutely is. The group was small with about 7 people in total, including my partner and I. Shawn, our trainer, was welcoming and made me feel at ease right away. The rest of the group was also very friendly and excited to see us newcomers. The workout I got was intense, but fun. Classes are 30 minutes each, and you will absolutely feel the burn at the end of it. It doesn't matter if you're a beginner or advanced, they will teach you everything at the pace you need.

Thanks for helping me start my fitness journey, Lionheart!

originalText.text: I’ve gotten so much stronger over six months! It’s really amazing. Best gym in the area

text.text: I’ve gotten so much stronger over six months! It’s really amazing. Best gym in the area

originalText.text: I have been going to this gym for almost a year! The team is very friendly and welcoming. Ashley one of the co-owners is the most amazing trainer! She is very motivating and really cares for her clients. I have always struggled to stay consistent at the gym and she really has kept me motivated to keep coming back! She also has a very flexible schedule which works so well with my crazy work hours! Honestly, hands down the best experience I have had at a gym in a long time.
